events.name: INTE CONTEST
events.description: Each of last year's lists defends its colors in a variety of games (Slip 'N Slide, tug-of-war...)! It's up to you to help your group win. You can also take part in the famous rap contender between the lists...

events.name: CABARET
events.description: Discover ITM talents in this cabaret prepared by the BDA! You'll have the chance to see some unique performances, or even take part yourself and show off your talent!
